src:
Hasil Pertandingan Bologna vs Inter Milan: Skor 1-2
03 Nov 2019, 02:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Inter Milan mendapat tiga poin dalam lawatan ke markas Bologna, Stadio Dallâ€™Ara, Minggu (3/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Laga giornata ke-11 Serie A tersebut dimenangkan Inter Milan dengan skor 1-2, setelah tertinggal lebih dulu.
Inter tertinggal dari gol Roberto Soriano pada menit 59. Namun, Romelu Lukaku tampil sebagai pahlawan bagi Inter Milan. Mantan pemain Manchester United mencetak dua gol, termasuk penalti pada menit 90+1.
Kemenangan ini membuat Inter Milan terus bersaing dengan Juventus di papan atas klasemen. Tim arahan Antonio Conte telah meraih 28 poin dari 11 pertandingan yang dimainkan.
text:
Bologna vs Inter Milan Results: Score 1-2
Nov 3 2019, 2:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Inter Milan received three points on a visit to Bologna headquarters, Stadio Dall'Ara, Sunday (11/03/2019) early morning hrs. The 11th Serie A giornata was won by Inter Milan with a score of 1-2, after falling behind first.
Inter fell behind Roberto Soriano on 59 minutes. However, Romelu Lukaku appeared as a hero for Inter Milan. The former Manchester United player scored two goals, including a 90 + 1 minute penalty.
This victory makes Inter Milan continue to compete with Juventus in the top flight. Antonio Conte's landing team has won 28 points from 11 matches played.
